message.body: Are you cool if I stop over after 6?
I was just about to text you. Yeah that works. Kristen should be home shortly after then we can get wings
You are more than welcome to come over anytime on Saturday btw.

Alright the guy from the place hat just looked at my pump gave me an estimate... 13k. They have a great warranty which is nice but that cost is crazy! The only when I told him I couldn't make a decision today he was a little bit of a douche
Do you think there will be a cost from your guy to come out and look at my system to give me an estimate?
Good because to have these places to come out and each are telling me different things that are wrong, I've had a fee to pay.
